title: Please explain, in detail, in what respect the proposal does not comply with these Regulations and the reasons therefore, attaching separate sheets for this information, if necessary
clause_text: Please explain, in detail, in what respect the proposal does not comply with these Regulations and the reasons therefore, attaching separate sheets for this information, if necessary. I am the owner-lessee/mortgagee in possession/ of the plot on which the work is proposed and that the statements made in this Form are true and correct. Form of certificate be signed by the Licensed Surveyor/Engineer/Structural Engineer/Supervisor or Architect/ Professionals on Records employed by the Applicant

source_pdf.text_snippet: Please explain, in detail, in what respect the proposal does not comply with these Regulations and the reasons therefore, attaching separate sheets for this information, if necessary.
